item.description:
Enjoy an evening of fun and laughter while you relax at Welch Pool in Windsor at an adult comedy night. From 8:00 to 10:00 PM, bring a chair, sit back and enjoy a great comedian while sipping on a non-alcoholic frozen drink. This event is for ages 21 and older. Admission is $15 in advance and $20 at the gate, with one frozen drink included.

Welch Park / Pool is just off from Poquonock Avnenue / Route 75 in Poquonock (just down the hill from Gloria's house or a couple miles north of Sharon S.' house for reference).

Check in with Sharon about buying the advance tickets.
item.how_to_find_us: Sharon S. is the host and you should check in with her about purchasing the advance tickets and saving $5!
item.name: Outdoor Comedy Night
